text-placeholder: Enter your text here and watch the magic happen ✨✨
sub-title: The best and easiest text decorator

replace-decoration-help.title: Replace decoration
replace-decoration-help.text: Replaces the current decoration of the text with a new one. This will also remove the current decoration.

replicate-decoration-help.title: Replicate decoration
replicate-decoration-help.text: Replicates the chosen decoration for all other styles at one time.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
